TopicTitle: [1.0.4] ACP-v7 - Atmo, Auroras, Stratus/Cirrus clouds, Lightning, Dust storms, Bioluminescence

Articles.Content:
> 
> Hey man. Is it possible to have environmental sounds on Kerbin? Say strong winds on the open flat snow areas and maybe seashore sounds at the land edges and a sound for when at sea. This would be amazing.

Agreed that would be super amazing... You'll have to ask Pizzaoverhead though. He's the sound guru ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif). My answer would be yes, though. You could probably base it off the biome maps so that if you're under 8 kilometers it plays a different sound file for each biome. In that case you could probably easily do other planets too. Sounds doable to me. You might even want to shoot a PM to Ted or another developer on this too. It would be nice to see something like that in stock eventually.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-10-28T00:49:13Z" title="10/28/2015 12:49  AM" data-short="8 yr">October 28, 2015</time> by Avera9eJoe**
Excuse me, Avera9eJoe, but you seem to have a dodo list in place of a todo list.

> 
> Excuse me, Avera9eJoe, but you seem to have a dodo list in place of a todo list.

Ha! That's funny. Maybe I should link an image of a dodo XD

[jlcarneiro](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55905-1-05-1-05-1-Nov-10-2015-EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements?p=2288904&viewfull=1#post2288904) pointed me to you - the new version of EVE does not work with your configs anymore?

> 
> [jlcarneiro](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55905-1-05-1-05-1-Nov-10-2015-EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements?p=2288904&viewfull=1#post2288904) pointed me to you - the new version of EVE does not work with your configs anymore?

Sadly it doesn't. I would have to start from scratch if I were to update it, and even then the new EVE doesn't have the same parameters required to set up atmospheres the same way. I suggest checking out [Nhawks17's SVE](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/137223-WIP-1-0-4-Stock-Visual-Enhancements-SVE-A-Port-of-RVE) in the meantime.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-11-11T19:36:41Z" title="11/11/2015 07:36  PM" data-short="8 yr">November 11, 2015</time> by Avera9eJoe**

> 
> Hey man. Is it possible to have environmental sounds on Kerbin? Say strong winds on the open flat snow areas and maybe seashore sounds at the land edges and a sound for when at sea. This would be amazing.

I also want to see this, someone shoot pizzaoverhead a message.
I just downloaded this and followed everything the instructions said, but it literally did nothing, the kerbol system looks no different than stock.

Sorry to say but it no longer works. This mod is outdated as it used the old version of EVE. I suggest you check out KSPRC or Stock Visual Enhancements ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

> 
> 
> On 2/15/2016 at 10:52 AM, Avera9eJoe said:
> 
> 
> Sorry to say but it no longer works. This mod is outdated as it used the old version of EVE. I suggest you check out KSPRC or Stock Visual Enhancements ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
> 

Do you plan on **ever** upgrading this mod to the 1.1 EVE or is this a cancelled project?

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, nosirrbro said:
> 
> 
> Do you plan on **ever** upgrading this mod to the 1.1 EVE or is this a cancelled project?
> 

Cancelled project. I haven't taken the time to learn new EVE and I'm too much of a fan of both KSPRC and SVE to co-compete with Proot and NHawks17. It was fun while it lasted. It warms my heart to see you asking for it to be updated, but other people have done it better and more updated now. Passing on the torch.
